Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 28 of his 37 points in the second half
Edwards hit a pair of critical 3-pointers late in the fourth quarter
Minnesota Timberwolves overcame a 19-point first-half deficit
Kawhi Leonard scored eight points on 3-for-11 shooting in his second game of the season
Clippers led 96-91 with 4:07 remaining after an 11-0 run
Post-Match Reflections: Edwards expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
